Read Me

This website was created with Eleventy (11ty), a simple and flexible static site generator that converts templates and data files into static HTML pages. Eleventy supports different templating languages, giving it an adaptable option for developers.

Steps on How to Run my Website

  1. Open Visual Studio Code, open folder, and select the folder, eleventy-sample.

  2. Open a new terminal in Visual Studio Code.

  3. Ensure the directory is eleventy-sample.

  4. Use --serve to start up a hot-reloading local web server.

  • npx @11ty/eleventy --serve
  1. Open http://localhost:8080/ in a Google Chrome web browser to see my Eleventy site live.
